quote: You may begin to notice the path that is already opening for you.
note: 提前设定方向并温和引导选择

quote: Perhaps you have wondered about the parts you have not yet told me.
note: 留白细节，邀请对方补充

quote: And as you picture that future, the meaning of each step becomes clearer.
note: 描绘未来镜头并放大意义

quote: Would you like to start with the easy part, or with the one you enjoy most?
note: 选择式跟导，引向渐进承诺

quote: It makes sense you felt that way, and it shows how much you care.
note: 共感反馈并对齐意义

quote: We can take one small step now, knowing another will naturally follow.
note: 渐进承诺，轻柔推进

quote: So, if I hear you right, the concern is about timing more than ability.
note: 复述框定并对比转向

quote: Because this matters to your team, even a small adjustment will ripple outward.
note: 预先对齐意义，放大影响

quote: I am not saying it is impossible; I am saying we can choose a better moment.
note: 模糊否定搭配间接表态

quote: Every effort here already points toward something valuable for you.
note: 意义放大，温和强调

quote: Earlier you handled delays with patience, and now this stage invites the same calm.
note: 时间拉开连接阶段性标签

quote: We could look at it as being stuck, or as choosing the path that keeps options open.
note: 对比转向配合选择式跟导

quote: After you finish the first draft, you can decide how boldly to present it.
note: 假设前提与提前设定方向

quote: You handled the kickoff phase; now you are the person to guide this next layer.
note: 阶段性标签，推到渐进承诺

quote: Keep that strength, and perhaps just soften the tone in the opening line.
note: 微调肯定结合意义对齐

quote: Imagine how your client hears this when you speak as their future partner.
note: 角色切换配合镜像语言

quote: We can pause here, letting the right response come up in its own time.
note: 允许停顿与共感陪伴

quote: As you say it that way, you can feel how the tone gently mirrors theirs.
note: 镜像语言并轻柔强调

quote: You might simply notice, even slightly, that you already lean toward that option.
note: 温和强调带出未来镜头

quote: Some people say it directly; you prefer to show it through the way you arrange choices.
note: 间接表态搭配对比转向

quote: From the start you knew the direction, and that clarity makes each action meaningful.
note: 方向预设与意义放大

quote: You might leave room for their idea and then add a light tweak to support it.
note: 留白细节后进行微调肯定

quote: See that picture forming, and just take the first friendly step toward it.
note: 未来镜头结合渐进承诺

quote: Would it fit better to summarize now, or to let me restate what you meant?
note: 选择式跟导与复述框定

quote: You have been patient through earlier steps, and your care shows in this concern too.
note: 共感反馈并贴阶段标签

quote: Last time you made a small move, and today we can take the next short one.
note: 渐进承诺与时间拉开

quote: Since the purpose is shared, shifting the angle slightly will open a better route.
note: 意义对齐并对比转向

quote: It is not that you must refuse; you could answer as a future collaborator would.
note: 模糊否定结合角色切换

quote: Earlier pauses helped them feel heard; a similar pause now will mirror their pace.
note: 时间拉开与镜像语言

quote: Simply mentioning it this way can softly show you value what they care about.
note: 温和强调配合共感反馈
